reviews.title: Customer Reviews
reviews.review1: Excellent service, vehicle exactly as described. Fast delivery and a very professional team.
reviews.review2: Very happy with my purchase. The 12-month warranty is a real bonus. Highly recommended.
reviews.review3: Great value for money. The buying process is simple and transparent.

about.title: About MCD AUTO
about.historyText: For over 15 years, MCD AUTO has been your trusted partner for quality used vehicles. What started as a small family business is now one of the region's leading used car dealers.
about.missionText: We aim to offer every customer the perfect vehicle at a fair price — with full transparency, comprehensive warranty, and first-class service.

services.title: Our Services
services.heroSubtitle: Discover all our solutions for your vehicle purchase
services.financingIntro: Buy your vehicle today and pay comfortably with our interest-free installment plan.
services.step3: Pay the remaining balance in fixed monthly installments.
services.condFlexible: Flexible deposit based on your budget
services.paymentCash: Cash payment: 15% discount on the price
services.paymentInstallments: Installment payment: Minimum 20% deposit, remainder in interest-free installments, no bank required
services.importDelivery: Delivery: 5-day lead time, registration in buyer's name included
services.importManufacturer: Manufacturer warranty: 24 to 60 months available on all vehicles
services.tradeinDesc: We buy your old vehicle at a fair price. Free appraisal and instant payment.
services.maintenanceDesc: Our experienced workshop team takes care of your vehicle — from inspection to repair.
services.warrantyDesc: Up to 24 months warranty on all our vehicles. Drive worry-free.
services.afterSalesDesc: Even after purchase, we're here for you. Our customer service is always available.

estimation.title: Get Your Vehicle Appraised
estimation.heroSubtitle: Get a free and fast estimate of your vehicle's value
estimation.intro: Looking to sell or trade in your vehicle? We offer a free, transparent and no-obligation appraisal.
estimation.step1: Fill in the form with your vehicle details.
estimation.step2: Our experts analyze the market and your vehicle's condition.
estimation.step3: You receive a firm purchase offer within 24 hours.
estimation.step4: If you accept, we proceed with immediate payment.
estimation.advDeduction: Option to deduct value towards a new vehicle
estimation.critBrand: Brand, model and year of registration
estimation.ctaTitle: Ready to get your vehicle appraised?

maintenancePage.title: Maintenance & Repair
maintenancePage.heroSubtitle: Professional service to keep your vehicle in perfect condition
maintenancePage.intro: Our professional workshop handles routine maintenance and repairs for all vehicle types, regardless of brand.
maintenancePage.whyTransparent: Free and transparent quote before any work
maintenancePage.packageBasicDesc: Oil change + filters + fluid check + safety points
maintenancePage.packagePremiumDesc: Complete + timing belt + clutch + extended warranty

evaluation.title: Get Your Vehicle Valued
evaluation.subtitle: Get a free and no-obligation estimate in just a few minutes
evaluation.step1Desc: Get a quick estimate of your vehicle in just a few clicks
evaluation.step2Desc: Our experts analyze the actual condition of your vehicle
evaluation.step3Desc: We offer you the fairest market price
evaluation.step4Desc: Evaluation and payment in just 24 hours
evaluation.detail1Desc: We examine interior and exterior condition, mileage, service history and any damage.
evaluation.detail2Desc: We compare your vehicle with current market prices to offer a fair estimate.
evaluation.detail3Desc: You receive a no-obligation, personalized purchase offer valid for 30 days.
evaluation.ctaDesc: Get a free estimate now and discover the real value of your vehicle.

sell.title: Sell Your Car
sell.subtitle: Selling your used vehicle has never been easier
sell.benefit1Desc: We guarantee the best market price
sell.benefit2Desc: Simplified process: evaluation, sale and payment in 24h
sell.benefit4Desc: No paperwork, no stress, no negotiation
sell.step1: Contact us with your vehicle details
sell.step3: Have your car inspected at one of our centers
sell.faq1Q: Does my vehicle need to be in perfect condition?
sell.faq1A: No, we buy vehicles in any condition. We account for natural wear and minor damage in our evaluation.
sell.faq2Q: How long does the process take?
sell.faq2A: From the initial evaluation to the final payment, the process typically takes 24 hours.
sell.faq3Q: Do I need to bring my vehicle to a specific center?
sell.faq3A: Yes, we have several centers nationwide. We'll help you find the nearest one.
sell.ctaDesc: Contact us now for a free and no-obligation evaluation.

repair.title: Repair Service
repair.subtitle: Professional quality repairs at fair prices
repair.service1Desc: Engine, transmission, suspension, braking and much more
repair.service2Desc: Quick and accurate identification of all problems
repair.service3Desc: Free quote with no surprises on the final bill
repair.service4Desc: Repairs completed in the shortest possible time
repair.ctaDesc: Contact our experts now for a free and no-obligation quote.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to your questions
faq.a1: We are open Monday to Friday from 9am to 6pm, and Saturday from 10am to 4pm. Closed on Sundays.
faq.q2: Do you offer a pickup service?
faq.a2: Yes, we can pick up your vehicle for free if you sell it to us.
faq.a3: Delivery is typically within 5 business days. Faster delivery can be arranged for an additional fee.
faq.a4: Yes, we offer interest-free financing over 24 to 48 months with a flexible deposit.
faq.q5: Is there a warranty on the vehicles?
faq.a5: Yes, all vehicles include a 24-month warranty on hidden defects.
faq.a6: Absolutely! We can accept your old vehicle as part of your purchase.
faq.a7: You choose a vehicle, we perform a complete check, you sign the documents and you're done!
faq.q8: Do you offer an extended manufacturer warranty?
faq.a8: Yes, we can offer an extended manufacturer warranty of up to 60 months.
faq.ctaDesc: Our team is at your disposal to help.

cgv.title: Terms and Conditions of Sale
cgv.intro: These terms and conditions govern our business relationships
cgv.section1: These Terms and Conditions of Sale govern the contractual relationships between MCD AUTO SARL and its customers for the sale of used vehicles.
cgv.section2: The prices listed are in euros including VAT. MCD AUTO reserves the right to change its prices at any time. The applicable price is the one in effect at the time of order.
cgv.section3: All our vehicles come with a minimum 12-month warranty, extendable up to 24 months. This warranty covers mechanical, electrical and electronic failures.
cgv.section4: In accordance with our "Satisfied or Refunded" policy, you have the right to withdraw from the purchase within 14 calendar days from the date of vehicle delivery, without having to give any reason.
cgv.section5: Delivery is made at our premises or at the address indicated by the customer. Delivery times are given for information purposes only.
cgv.section6: In the event of a dispute, an amicable solution will be sought before any legal action. The competent court is that of MCD AUTO's registered office.

warranty.title: Warranties & Protection
warranty.subtitle: Protect your investment with our comprehensive warranties
warranty.benefit1Desc: Cover all hidden defects and faults
warranty.benefit2Desc: From 24 to 60 months according to your needs
warranty.detail1Desc: We cover all defects not visible at the time of purchase.
warranty.detail2Desc: Engine, transmission, suspension, braking and other major systems.
warranty.detail3Desc: Regular maintenance required. Unlimited mileage. No deductibles.
warranty.ctaDesc: Choose the plan that suits you and drive worry-free.

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.subtitle: We deliver your vehicle quickly and safely
delivery.option1Desc: We deliver your vehicle directly to your address
delivery.option2Desc: Pick up your vehicle at one of our centers
delivery.option4Desc: We deliver across the entire country
delivery.detail1Desc: Delivery within 5 business days. You can choose your delivery day.
delivery.detail2Desc: Free for showroom pickup. From €250 for home deliveries depending on region.
delivery.detail3Desc: Your vehicle is delivered with 500km range, cleaned and in perfect working order.
delivery.detail4Desc: Delivery includes: completed registration, provisional insurance, COC and license plates.
delivery.ctaTitle: Ready to have your vehicle delivered?
delivery.ctaDesc: Select your vehicle and choose your preferred delivery option.

footer.description: Your specialist for guaranteed and inspected used vehicles.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.addressDetails:
Südwall 23
44137 Dortmund, Germany
Phone: +49 178 3724542
Email: contact@mcd-auto.com
legal.hostingDetails: This website is hosted by Lovable (Lovable Technologies Ltd).
legal.dataDetails1: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to access, rectify and delete your personal data. To exercise your rights, please contact us at: contact@mcd-auto.com
legal.dataDetails2: Data collected through contact forms is used exclusively to respond to your requests and is never shared with third parties without your explicit consent.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Protecting your personal data is our priority.
privacy.section1: We collect the following data: name, surname, email address, phone number, and any information you send us through our contact forms.
privacy.section2: The collected data is used to: respond to your contact requests, inform you about our vehicles and services, manage orders and deliveries.
privacy.section3: Your personal data is kept for a maximum of 3 years from your last interaction with us.
privacy.section4: In accordance with the GDPR, you have the following rights: right of access, right of rectification, right to erasure, right to restrict processing, right to data portability, right to object.
privacy.section5: To exercise your rights, contact us at: contact@mcd-auto.com
privacy.section6: This site uses technical cookies necessary for the proper functioning of the site. No advertising cookies are used without your consent.
